Title: Relates to making technical corrections to ensure gender neutrality for the admission to practice law and preventing any required disclosure of mental health history
Summary: Relates to making technical corrections to ensure gender neutrality for the admission to practice law and preventing the character fitness questionnaire from inquiring into an applicant's mental health history.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to making technical corrections to ensure gender neutrality for the admission to practice law and preventing any required disclosure of mental health history
